scripts.build: mkdir -p dist/assets/icons && cp src/popup.html dist/ && pnpm exec esbuild src/background.js --bundle --outfile=dist/background.js && pnpm exec esbuild src/popup.js --bundle --outfile=dist/popup.js && pnpm exec esbuild src/content.js --bundle --outfile=dist/content.js && [ ! -f dist/assets/icons/icon.svg ] && echo "<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 24 24' width='24' height='24'><path fill='none' d='M0 0h24v24H0z'/><path d='M20 3H4c-1.1 0-2 .9-2 2v14c0 1.1.9 2 2 2h16c1.1 0 2-.9 2-2V5c0-1.1-.9-2-2-2zm0 16H4V5h16v14zM18 15H6v-2h12v2zm0-4H6V9h12v2z' fill='currentColor'/></svg>" > dist/assets/icons/icon.svg || true
